text: Gredos may refer to: * Sierra de Gredos, a mountain range in the centre of the Iberian Peninsula * Circo de Gredos, a glacial cirque situated in the central part of the northern slope of the Sierra de Gredos of the Iberian Peninsula * Navarredonda de Gredos, a municipality located in the province of Ávila, Castile and León, Spain. * San Juan de Gredos, a municipality located in the province of Ávila, Castile and León, Spain. * Western Spanish ibex or Gredos ibex, a vulnerable goat endemic to Spain and Portugal. * SEAT Gredos, a car model by the Spanish automaker SEAT
title: Gredos
